description: Deploys a model into production via the KServe Python SDK.

stdin: python deploy.py --deployment-name pdk-3d-brain-mri-deploy --git-url https://git@github.com:/determined-ai/pdk.git  --handler brain_mri_handler.py --git-ref dev_3dmri --sub-dir examples/3d-brain-mri/container/deploy --service-account-name pach-deploy --max-request-size 400553500 --max-response-size 400553500 --resource-requests nvidia.com/gpu=1,memory=16Gi --resource-limits nvidia.com/gpu=1,memory=16Gi --tolerations accelerator=Tesla-T4
